chunk:
Brand: Vika's Essentials

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Rosehip Seed (Rosa rubiginosa) Oil*, Jojoba Seed (Simmondsia chinensis) Oil*, Moringa oleifera seed Oil*, Raspberry Seed (Rubus idaeus) Oil*, Opuntia ficus indica seed Oil*, Vitamin E (Tocopherol), Everlasting (Helichrysum italicum) Oil*, Matricaria recutita Oil*
book: 2689-VIKA’S ESSENTIALS SEEDS OF LIFE FACIAL SERUM

chunk:
Directions: Apply lightly on damp skin after using Vika's Floral Toner or Propolis Myst.

Warnings: Store it in a cool dry place, use within 6 months.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
book: 2689-VIKA’S ESSENTIALS SEEDS OF LIFE FACIAL SERUM
